My Life

Hello! I’m a student Graphic Designer based in Ottawa, Ontario. I am constantly being inspired by the beauty around me and the creativity that comes with the inspiration. My interests include hiking, skiing, drawing, and travelling. My family and friends are incredibly important to me and have helped me along this journey of becoming a designer.
